#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        int n,m;
        cin>>n>>m;

        int tn=0;

        if(n==1)
            cout<<"R"<<endl;
        else if(m==1)
            cout<<"D"<<endl;

        else
        {
            if(n==m)
                tn = 2*(n-1);

            else if(n>m)
                tn = 2*m - 1;

            else if (n<m)
                tn = 2*(n-1);

            if(tn%4==0)
                cout<<"R"<<endl;
			else if(tn%4==1)
                cout<<"D"<<endl;
			else if(tn%4==2)
                cout<<"L"<<endl;
			else
                cout<<"U"<<endl;

        }

    }
}
